body:
This is post #1 of a bunch of posts I'm making called Avicus Loopholes!

tired of having a moderator LOCK your posts because you didn't make a video hub?

NEVER TO FEAR

so I'm probably dumb and everyone does this but 

A. Make a video
B. make a post about your video
(later in life)
C makes another video
D. edits the name and description of the previous post to look like a brand new thread.
Mods can't lock this because it's not multiple threads; you just edited it to make it look like one

Thanks

Miles
